text: Beyond Mombasa is a 1956 British American adventure movie directed by George Marshall and starring Cornel Wilde, Donna Reed, Leo Genn, Ron Randell, Christopher Lee. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1956 adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by George Marshall Category:Movies set in Kenya Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Beyond Mombasa
